summary: My companions pack is a mod that add various lore friendly companions each with it´s own \"miniquest\"
descriptionHtml:
My companions pack is a mod that add various lore friendly companions each with it´s own \"miniquest\".

This mod adds lore friendly companions each one with a different miniquest that can be solved by reading journals and notes in the end there will be rewards.

Important: If you are using my old companions uninstall them and make a clean save before installing this ones.


Devani

Devani is a dunmer, she was rescued by a 200 year old vampire called Martin from an argonian camp in morrowind 12 years ago.Since then she helped Martin with his study of what´s left of the dwemer ruins in morrowind.After that she and Martin went to solstheim and settled there, Martin tought her the art of the blade.What better way to train than with a vampire.One day she was attacked by argonian slavers and learned the location of their leader in skyrim, on her way there she got lost in morrowind border.

NOTE:
- This new NPC is not affected by the discolored head bug. 
- You can change her oufits.
- She´s essential.
- She levels up as the player´s
- Her miniquest can be solved by reading her diary.


Isamu

Isamu is a tang mo, a race of monkeys from akavir, he and a ka po tun warrior came to skyrim looking for dragon scales to take back to akavir, somehow Isamu ended up in Solitude jail.

NOTE:
- This new NPC is not affected by the discolored head bug.
- He levels up as the player´s
- Not a playable race.
- His miniquest can be solved by reading his journal.


Eyja

Eyja is a young nord girl looking for adventure.She joined the companions and is waiting for a shield brother to help her on a contract.

NOTE:
- This new NPC is not affected by the discolored head bug.
- You can change her oufits.
- She´s essential.
- She levels up as the player´s
- To solve her miniquest read the contract note.


Anora

Anora, is a redguard assassin who wittness the Imperials killing her parents.After years tracking the ones who did it she finnally found them in skyrim.She´s in hammerfell border.

NOTE:
- This new NPC is not affected by the discolored head bug.
- She levels up as the player´s
- His miniquest can be solved by reading her letter.


Janus

Janus is a vigilant of stendar, he is waiting for his colleague at the stendarr beacon southeast of riften.

NOTE:
- This new NPC is not affected by the discolored head bug.
- You can change his oufits.
- He´s essential.
- He levels up as the player´s
- To solve His miniquest read the report.


S´Drassa

S´Drassa is a khajiit caravan guard who lost his caravan in a forsworn attack in whiterun hold and so he went to whiterun in hopes to find help and instead he found only a closed door, so S´Drassa awaits outside whiterun for somebody to help him.

NOTE:
- This new NPC is not affected by the discolored head bug.
- You can change his oufits.
- He´s essential.
- He levels up as the player´s
- To solve His miniquest read the notice.




Credits: Bellyache for the brown chaurus texture (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3621)
author: Scot
